text: Sir Frederick Nathaniel Ballantyne, GCMG (5 July 1936 â€“ 23 January 2020) was the Governor-General of Saint Vincent and the Grenadines from 2002 to 2019. He was a cardiologist and former chief medical officer. ==References== ==Other websites== * The Governor General: Official Website of the Government of St. Vincent & the Grenadines Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Governors-General of Saint Vincent and the Grenadines Category:Knights Grand Cross of the Order of St Michael and St George
